data.title: How do I subscribe?
data.descr:
You can subscribe to 'Orange Swipe & Win' service by:
Following the link via 'my Orange' app menu
Visit https://swipe.orange.eg
Dial #53# from your Orange mobile number
Send SUB to 5055 from your Orange mobile number

data.title: What is the duration of the service?
What are the prizes?
data.descr:
Swipe & Win service gives away:

  • 50 MB once upon scoring 10 or more correct questions
  • 300 EGP in Orange Cash every day
  • 3,000 EGP in Cash every week
  • 30,000 EGP in Cash every month

data.title: If I win how will I be informed?
data.descr: The winner will be contacted by Orange in the next days as to explain the process needed. So do not worry, just keep your phone on.

data.title: How many times may I win each prize?
data.descr: Each user is eligible to win the daily prize unlimited times and rest prizes only once.

data.title: What are the Swipe & Win game rules?
data.descr:
Each game lasts for 55 seconds.

Each question is consisted of a statement and a photo.

User has to Swipe right for Correct or left for Wrong.

Be careful! Every wrong reply deducts 5 seconds from the remaining time!

During a game round, special questions may also be served such as bronze, silver and golden ones.

data.title: Does my Swipe & Win credits expire?
data.descr: Both awarded and purchased Swipe & Win credits expire at the end of calendar day if not consumed until then.

data.title: I consume my daily credit, can I add more?
data.descr: You can purchase a bundle of 3 Swipe & Win credits only for 2 EGP upon consuming your available daily credit. Each user may play up to 5 extra rounds per day.

data.title: How can I unsubscribe?
data.descr: To cancel your 'Orange Swipe & Win' subscription, send 'STOP' to the short code 5055.

data.title: I'm not an Orange subscriber, may I participate to the service?
data.descr: No, if you are not an Orange subscriber unfortunately you cannot subscribe to the service.
